msg.msgText:
A "Queue" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create Queue help imaserver create Queue "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create Queue "Name=Queue1"
Configuration items for "Queue" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
